title: Emerald and Diamond Grand Haaram - Adorable Collection
materials: Natural Emeralds (Smooth Cabochon Cut). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed central motif with floral and paisley patterns. Features a cluster setting of diamonds around emeralds. Diamond drops with emerald beads add a touch of elegance. The necklace showcases the traditional Telugu craftsmanship with a modern twist, suitable for all ages.
colors: Primary colors are Emerald Green and Diamond White against a backdrop of Yellow Gold.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram showcases a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian designs and contemporary aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds guarantees brilliance and sophistication. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty, making it a cherished heirloom.
